author: dildick
body:
#### PR description:

This PR replaces the usage of public member variables (e.g. `bestALCT`) to public member functions (e.g. `getBestALCT()`) in CSC motherboard classes - an artifact of the legacy CSC TP emulator code.

#### PR validation:

I tested it with WF 22034.0

@tahuang1991
title: Replace public variable with public function in CSC TP emulator
